subject: Football (College)
Eyeglasses
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: South Carolina’s Landon Ard wears prescription glasses on the field for an eye condition, but his looks have prompted insults from spectators and even a television analyst.
snippet: South Carolina’s Landon Ard wears prescription glasses on the field for an eye condition, but his looks have prompted insults from spectators and even a television analyst.
